message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value and my budget.
